title: ATDev develops Reflex to bring robotics and AI to rehabilitation
description:
Assistive Technology Development, or ATDev, is working with people with disabilities to develop systems for rehab and daily tasks.

The post ATDev develops Reflex to bring robotics and AI to rehabilitation appeared first on The Robot Report.
